design_philosophy.core_principle: Fusion of Precision and Opulence. The precision of a Swiss watch + the warmth of melted gold.
design_philosophy.visual_hierarchy: Dark Obsidian backgrounds > Subtle Gold/Bronze accents > Crisp White text.
anti_patterns: No generic 'SaaS Blue' or 'Teal' for primary actions.
No flat gray backgrounds. Use noise/grain or deep rich gradients.
No default Shadcn borders (replace with custom metallic borders).

typography.installation_guide: Import from Google Fonts: Playfair Display (400, 700), Manrope (300, 400, 500, 700), JetBrains Mono (400)

layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: Bento Grid Mode A (Tetris). Use `grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-12` with `gap-6`.
layout_strategies.table_layout: Density Mode B. 100% width, no outer padding on mobile. Sticky headers with backdrop-blur-md.

cards.classes: bg-neutral-950/50 border border-white/5 hover:border-amber-500/30 transition-colors duration-500 backdrop-blur-xl relative overflow-hidden group
cards.hover_effect: Add a subtle golden glow or gradient border on hover.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black font-semibold hover:bg-[#B5952F] rounded-none px-8 py-6 uppercase tracking-wider text-xs shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none px-6 py-6 uppercase tracking-wider text-xs

inputs.style: bg-neutral-900/50 border-white/10 focus:border-[#D4AF37]/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4AF37]/20 rounded-md h-12 text-sm font-body

tables.header: bg-neutral-950/80 backdrop-blur text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-500 font-medium py-4
tables.row: border-b border-white/5 hover:bg-white/[0.02] transition-colors h-14 font-body text-sm

navigation.sidebar: bg-[#050505] border-r border-white/5 w-64 fixed h-full z-50

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Dark Mode is mandatory. Do not build a light mode toggle unless specifically asked.
All SKU displays must be Monospace.
implementation_steps: 1. Setup Tailwind Colors in `tailwind.config.js` with the Palette.
2. Install Fonts (Playfair Display, Manrope, JetBrains Mono).
3. Create the 'AppShell' layout with Sidebar and Topbar.
4. Build the 'DashboardOverview' using the Bento Grid.
5. Implement 'SKUGenerator' with a slot-machine animation effect.
6. Build the 'ProductTable' with robust filtering and custom styling.
7. Ensure all Forms use Shadcn components styled with the guidelines.
